EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal Partner Days_2017.Austin ISV Training Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Partner Days - Austin | Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Partner Days in Austin, TX.
Date & Time: February 21-23, 2017 Location: VMware, 3900 N Capital of Texas Hwy, Suite 500, Austin, TX 78746
We are very excited to be hosting this event. In the past, partners who have attended the event have been able to significantly fast track their integration with the Pivotal Cloud Foundry platform. We hope you'll find it as valuable as well.
Follow these links to get ready:
- How to prepare and what to bring <[[http://industryday.cfapps.io/prereqs/]]> [REPLACE WITH NEW WEBSITE LINK FOR PREPARATION AND WHAT TO BRING] - Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/partner-days/austin/software-integration-workshop]]>
Questions? Please contact Marina Joseph, Technical Program Manager, ISV Engineering, Pivotal Cloud Foundry at mjoseph@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mjoseph@pivotal.io]]>.
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry ISV Engineering Team
